thread.title: Study finds EISA 2007 law’s renewable fuel mandates won’t work in 2015
thread.title_full: Study finds EISA 2007 law’s renewable fuel mandates won’t work in 2015

title: Study finds EISA 2007 law’s renewable fuel mandates won’t work in 2015
text:
10 Study finds EISA 2007 law’s renewable fuel mandates won’t work in 2015 
Oil & Gas Journal: It will not be feasible for the US to reach renewable fuel volumes that the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (EISA 2007) mandates in 2015 and beyond, a study commissioned by the American Petroleum Institute concluded.“The current level of gasoline demand, the blend wall limiting the share of ethanol that can be blended into the gasoline pool, and the lack of non-ethanol biofuels limit the market potential for total renewable biofuels,” the study by National Economic Research Associates (NERA) said.
